item.description:
Game OpenSource List

  • Citybound : A city building game that uses microscopic models to vividly simulate the organism of a city arising from the interactions of millions of individuals.

  • Ebiten : Ebiten is an open-source game library, with which you can develop 2D games with simple API for multi platforms in the Go programming language.
